319990.name: MAGIX Music Maker 2015 Premium
319990.description:
Make your own music with drag & drop. You have total control of all instruments and tools right from the start - no previous experience needed. MAGIX Music Maker 2015 Premium comes with even more power, more virtual instruments, more features and an arsenal of more than 6000 sounds & loops.  

MAGIX Music Maker lets you be a musician, singer or a producer. Dive into the world of Hip Hop, Drum & Bass, Techno or Funk and create your own song. Every sound has a different story - and you get to decide how that story is told.

Your Premium Features

  • Arrange more than 6000 loops & sounds with drag & drop
  • 10 Different Soundpools from various genres
  • 4 New instruments: Celtic Harp, Urban Drums, World Flutes, Analog Synths
  • Unlimited tracks – unlimited possibilities
  • Mastering Suite 4: More decibels - more quality
  • Auto Mastering: Superior sound with one click
  • 5.1 Surround-Mixing: Perfection right up to the last detail
  • Jazz Drums, Revolta 2 Synthesizer, Drum Engine, BeatBox 2
  • Additional effects such as the Analog Compressor

The easiest way to make music


Just hit record
Find your own sound in a heartbeat: Cut music, record instruments and vocals, mix all your tracks in the integrated mixer and add effects to whatever you want. The results are simply great.

Amazing effects
You can individually adjust the loudness of each track with the mixer and apply effects to any of them with the click of a mouse. From vintage to high-end effects: Take your sound to the next level.

New instruments

All the instruments in Music Maker 2015 can be played with the mouse, the screen keyboard or a USB keyboard.

Drum pads instead of game pads
Turn on the new Urban Drums virtual drum machine and find something to hold on to. These powerful drums are perfect for making Hip Hop and Dubstep beats.

The ultimate synthesizer:
Unbeatable: The Analog Synths virtual instrument brings the sounds of legendary analog synthesizers back from the grave and unites them in one powerful package.

Individualize your sound
Become the hero of an entire generation: The Vita Sampler allows you to use sound files from games and other pieces of music to create your own instrument. Endlessly modifiable.

Conquer new acoustic worlds
With its Scottish flair, the Celtic Harp tells stories of battles, love and distant galaxies. Which stories can you draw from the Celtic Harp?

Wild, exotic and hard to tame
The new World Flutes take you on a journey through the exotic soundscapes of different continents. Full of atmosphere and for any type of music.

Your basic equipment:


  • Electronic. Synthetic. Good. Synthesizer DN-e1
  • Vocal Tune 2: Tuning for vocal recordings
  • Screen keyboard: Make music with your mouse
  • Professional studio effects & plug-ins
  • VST 2 support
  • Import projects from the free Music Maker Jam app
  • A ton of fun
319990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 荷兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
